name: Virtual Perry
body:
### Info
This site is here for support information about the Virtual Perry applications... currently android is supported however IOS will be added once time permits. 

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```


### Authors and Contributors
@prpollock is the only current contributor.

### Support or Contact
Virtual Perry needs no support.. you must just be doing it wrong.. ask again.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
